sentences.en: All the time Stephen was lying face down and unconscious in the bath tub.
sentences.cn: 斯蒂芬一直脸朝下趴在浴缸里，不省人事。

sentences.en: He peeled the paper top off a little white tub and poured the cream into his coffee.
sentences.cn: 他把小白盒上的纸盖撕去，然后把奶油倒进他的咖啡里。

sentences.en: He scooped some ice - cream out of the tub.
sentences.cn: 他从桶里舀了一些冰淇淋.

sentences.en: I got in the big old wide - bottomed tub with the lion's feet.
sentences.cn: 我爬进那只宽底粗脚的老式大澡盆里.

sentences.en: I had a long soak in the tub.
I've been at sea for four lousy weeks in this tub.
sentences.cn: 我已经乘这条老爷船在海上航行了四个倒霉的星期.

sentences.en: No doubt he has been to sea in some tub or other.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问他不定坐了个什么小船儿在海上漂荡过.

sentences.en: She lay back in the tub.
sentences.cn: 她向后靠着躺在浴缸里。

sentences.en: She scooped some ice cream out of the tub.
sentences.cn: 她从纸杯里舀了些冰淇淋出来.

sentences.en: The girl washed clothes in a tub.
sentences.cn: 那女孩把衣服放在木盆里洗.

sentences.en: The girl washes clothes in a tub.
sentences.cn: 那女孩把衣服放在木盆里洗。

sentences.en: The tub needs fixing too. It leaks.
sentences.cn: 浴盆也得修了. 它漏.

sentences.en: The water splashed out of the tub upon the floor.
sentences.cn: 水从桶里澎出来,落在地板上.

sentences.en: The wooden tub is fitted with the iron hoop.
They consumed a tub of beer.
What I need is to soak in a hot tub.
sentences.cn: 我需要在热腾腾的澡盆里好好地泡一泡。

words.tran_cn: 桶状的；发钝音的；肥胖的

trans.tran_en: a large container in which you sit to wash yourself

trans.tran_cn: 洗盆浴；（衣服等）被放在桶里洗
